de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.main.gui.util

Class UTF8Bundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.ResourceBundle.Control
      • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.main.gui.util.UTF8Bundle

  • public class UTF8Bundle
extends java.util.ResourceBundle.Control
    Implements handling of UTF-8 encoded resourse bundles. Modified from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4659929/how-to-use-utf-8-in-resource-properties-with-resourcebundle
